name: Loop - Style
description:
IF YOU ARE NEW TO STABLE DIFFUSION OR YOU HAVE PROBLEMS WITH MY MODELS GO HERE: Guide

What's this LoRA

This is a LoRA trained on a particular style. It creates illustrations with a digital painting style and vibrant colors.

The images in the examples are created using only this LoRA and different models (mainly my custom:

  • https://civitai.com/models/24149

  • https://civitai.com/models/26332

  • https://civitai.com/models/28322

You don't need to specify a word to trigger this LoRA.

The LoRA works also on NSFW (check last examples).

The images are created using different weights (you can check on the image generation panel)

Guides

Learn how to create pictures like mine with my step-by-step tutorials:

  • Beginner's Guide

  • Prompting

  • My Workflow

  • Inpainting

If you want to create images with a high LoRA weight, I highly suggest you to check the tutorial.

Support

You can now support me and my work by subscribing to my Deviantart account. You'll also get awesome rewards:

If you want to support my work for free, you can also check out my music/art here:

  • Bandcamp

  • Instagram

  • DeviantArt
